title: Our Quality
text: We have a suitable physical plant for storage and distribution. Our staff is trained in locating those products that are of your interest, under a logistics plan of excellence.
text2: Our success lies in managing our operations from purchase to international commercialization. We work with suppliers who comply with good manufacturing and agricultural practices to obtain raw materials, supplies, and services with high standards, which ensures high-quality food for us. Audits are carried out at our location annually. We have the approval of the FSMA programs by the FDA inspection.
